meta_description: Studio Museum in Harlem is the nexus for artists of African descent locally, nationally, and internationally and for work that has been inspired and influenced by Black culture. It is a site for the dynamic exchange of ideas about art and society.
hours_text:

# Accessibility

Everyone is welcome at the Studio Museum in Harlem. We provide an assortment of programs and tools to ensure that the Museum is accessible to all.

[Coming to the Museum](/accessibility#coming_to_the_museum)[At the Museum](/accessibility#at_the_museum)[Access Programs](/accessibility#access_programs)[Digital Accessibility](/accessibility#digital_accessibility)
